attributes.action: save monmouth community under fives nursery
attributes.additional_details: Monmouth community under fives have been around for many years,have served generation's and generations children as a local nursery.This nursery has no goverment funding or education funding like the mainstream school nursery's do.Monmouth community under fives are at risk once again of closure as they are struggling to meet the rent increase opposed by bridges community centre.Come on peeps help save a fantastic nursery and lets try get it some funding from the education department
